page.title: 08The skies above our heads(1)
page.content: The skies above our block are busy with aircraft,both night and day.Military air traffic is very common.It flies most commonly at altitudes of between 250 and 500feet.It is using our block as a transit zone between the aircraft avoidance areas which surround London and Birmingham.These military planes have been using the ranges and bombing runs off S.Wales.When they pass over us they're routing back to bases in East Anglia,Lincolnshire or West Germany. These are the most common military planes:Harrier and Tornado(R.A.F.) A 10 Tankbusters (U.S.A.F.) Phantoms(either),and Hercules. We were surpised to discover that none of the planes over our block was from the nuclear strike base at Upper Heyford.
